00025 #include <physics/CSGShape>

00027 using physics::CSGShape;
00028 using physics::BoundingBox;
00029 using physics::BoundingSphere;

00034 
00035 CSGShape::CSGShape(const CSGShape& csgshape)
00036   : Shape(csgshape), operation(Leaf)
00037 {
00038   *this=csgshape;
00039 }
00040 
00041 CSGShape::CSGShape(const PolygonModel& p)
00042   : operation(Leaf), leaf(&p)
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00046 CSGShape& CSGShape::operator=(const CSGShape& csgshape)
00047 {
00048   // deep destruction
00049   switch(operation) {
00050   case Leaf: break;
00051   case Translation:
00052   case Rotation:
00053   case Scale:
00054     delete child1; break;
00055   case Union:
00056   case Intersection:
00057   case Difference:
00058     delete child1; delete child2; break;
00059   default:
00060     throw std::runtime_error(Exception("Bad CSG operation"));
00061   }
00062   
00063   // deep copy
00064   operation=csgshape.operation;
00065   switch(operation) {
00066   case Leaf: leaf=csgshape.leaf; break;
00067   case Union:
00068   case Intersection:
00069   case Difference:
00070     child1=new CSGShape(*csgshape.child1); child2=new CSGShape(*csgshape.child2); break;
00071   case Translation: trans=csgshape.trans; child1=new CSGShape(*csgshape.child1); break;
00072   case Rotation: rot=csgshape.rot; child1=new CSGShape(*csgshape.child1); break;
00073   case Scale: scale=csgshape.scale; child1=new CSGShape(*csgshape.child1); break;
00074   default:
00075     throw std::runtime_error(Exception("Bad CSG operation"));
00076   }
00077 
00078 return *this;
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 CSGShape::~CSGShape()
00083 {
00084   // deep destruction
00085   switch(operation) {
00086   case Leaf: break;
00087   case Translation:
00088   case Rotation:
00089   case Scale:
00090     delete child1; break;
00091   case Union:
00092   case Intersection:
00093   case Difference:
00094     delete child1; delete child2; break;
00095   default:
00096     throw std::runtime_error(Exception("Bad CSG operation"));
00097   }
00098 }

00101 BoundingBox CSGShape::getBoundingBox() const
00102 {
00103   // just union all the bb's
00104   return BoundingBox();
00105 }
00106 
00107 BoundingSphere CSGShape::getBoundingSphere() const
00108 {
00109   // just union all the bs's
00110   return BoundingSphere();
00111 }

00116 CSGShape& CSGShape::operator+=(const gfx::Vector3& translation)
00117 {
00118   CSGShape* child = new CSGShape();
00119   shallowCopyTo(*child);
00120   operation=Translation;
00121   trans=translation;
00122   child1=child;
00123   return *this;
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 CSGShape& CSGShape::operator*=(const gfx::Quat4& rotation)
00128 {
00129   CSGShape* child = new CSGShape();
00130   shallowCopyTo(*child);
00131   operation=Rotation;
00132   rot=rotation;
00133   child1=child;
00134   return *this;
00135 }
00136 
00137 
00138 CSGShape& CSGShape::operator*=(Real scale)
00139 {
00140   CSGShape* child = new CSGShape();
00141   shallowCopyTo(*child);
00142   operation=Scale;
00143   this->scale=scale;
00144   child1=child;
00145   return *this;
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 CSGShape& CSGShape::operator&=(const CSGShape& s)
00150 {
00151   CSGShape* child = new CSGShape();
00152   shallowCopyTo(*child);
00153   operation=Intersection;
00154   child1=child;
00155   child2=new CSGShape(s);
00156   return *this;
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 CSGShape& CSGShape::operator|=(const CSGShape& s)
00161 {
00162   CSGShape* child = new CSGShape();
00163   shallowCopyTo(*child);
00164   operation=Union;
00165   child1=child;
00166   child2=new CSGShape(s);
00167   return *this;
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 CSGShape& CSGShape::operator-=(const CSGShape& s)
00172 {
00173   CSGShape* child = new CSGShape();
00174   shallowCopyTo(*child);
00175   operation=Difference;
00176   child1=child;
00177   child2=new CSGShape(s);
00178   return *this;
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 void CSGShape::shallowCopyTo(CSGShape& s)
00183 {
00184   s.operation=operation;
00185   switch (operation) {
00186   case Union: s.child1=child1; s.child2=child2; break;
00187   case Intersection: s.child1=child1; s.child2=child2; break;
00188   case Difference: s.child1=child1; s.child2=child2; break;
00189   case Leaf: s.leaf = leaf; break;
00190   case Translation: s.trans=trans; s.child1=child1; break;
00191   case Rotation: s.rot=rot; s.child1=child1; break;
00192   case Scale: s.scale=scale; s.child1=child1; break;
00193   default:
00194     throw std::runtime_error(Exception("bad CSG operation"));
00195   }
00196 }

00199 osg::GeoSet& CSGShape::getGeoSet() const
00200 {
00201   return *new osg::GeoSet(); // implement!!!
